channel.title: Copy and Paste on 0x000216
channel.description: Recent content in Copy and Paste on 0x000216

item.title: Copying and pasting does not function when transferring between an RDP session and a local workstation.
item.description: This post has been revised based on feedback indicating a local drive connection isn’t necessary for text copy/paste. While connecting a local drive previously solved the issue for me, it’s not always required. Reconnecting to the RDP session sometimes helps, but not always. The problem is explained thoroughly in a Terminal Server team blog post, which highlights two variations of the issue. Copying from the server to the local computer presents a different challenge than copying from the local computer to the server.
